verse.name: v1
verse.lines: At the Lamb's high feast we sing, Praise to our victorious King, Who has washed us in the tide Flowing from his pierc√®d side; Alleluia!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Praise we Him, whose love divine Gives His sacred blood for wine, Gives His body for the feast, Christ the Victim, Christ the Priest. Alleluia!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Where the Paschal blood is poured, Death's dark angel sheathes his sword; Israel's hosts triumphant go Through the wave that drowns the foe. Alleluia!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Praise we Christ, whose blood was shed, Paschal Victim, Paschal Bread; With sincerity and love Eat we Manna from above. Alleluia!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Mighty Victim from the sky, Hell's fierce pow'rs beneath Thee lie; Thou hast conquered in the fight, Thou hast brought us life and light; Alleluia!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Now no more can death appall,
Now no more the grave enthrall;
Thou hast opened Paradise,
And in Thee Thy saints shall rise.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Paschal triumph, Easter joy,
This alone can sin destroy;
From sin's death do Thou set free
Souls reborn, O Lord, in Thee.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Hymns of glory and of praise,
Father, to Thee we raise;
Risen Lord, all praise to Thee,
Ever with the Spirit be.
